mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students(name, kana_name, nickname, mail, city, age, gender, remark, is_deleted) VALUES(#{name}, #{kanaName}, #{nickname}, #{mail}, #{city}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{remark}, #{isDeleted})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET name = #{name}, kana_name = #{kanaName}, nickname = #{nickname}, mail = #{mail}, city = #{city}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, remark = #{remark}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE student_id = #{studentId}
